agent_utterance: Great job showing up today. Here’s a simple three-step boost for this hot morning: 1) drink a glass of water now (about 250–300 ml) to hydrate, 2) have a small, balanced snack with protein and fruit (e.g., yogurt with berries or a handful of almonds and an apple), 3) log your hunger/urge level and a quick mood note. If you’re pressed for time, start with B (breath/reset and the log) and do the snack a bit later. You’ve got this—let me know how you feel after these steps.
